title: Supreme Court appears wary of allowing Trump to fire Fed's Cook in closely watched case
full_text: Supreme Court appears wary of allowing Trump to fire Fed's Cook in closely watched case. The administration wants the authority to fire Lisa Cook, a Fed governor. Experts say that would undermine the independence of the central bank.. The Supreme Court appeared skeptical Wednesday of President Trump's attempt to fire a member of the Federal Reserve Board of Governors, an authority that most experts say would imperil the independen… [+2139 chars]
